heading: Insufficient Workers
text: You do not have the required workers free for this craft.

heading: No Crafting Slots Available
text: Your crafting slots are all in use, please remove a craft to continue.

heading: No Fortune Slots Available
text: You do not have any available fortune slots.

heading: Cannot Recollect Fortune
text: Your inventory is currently full.

heading: Cannot Upgrade Worker
text: You do not have enough gold to upgrade this worker.

heading: Epic Craft!
text: You crafted a {0} of Epic rarity!

heading: Great Craft!
text: You crafted a {0} of Great rarity!

heading: Good Craft!
text: You crafted a {0} of Good rarity!

heading: Insufficient Materials
text: You do not have enough materials to master this recipe.

heading: Inventory Full
text: Your inventory is full, please sell something to continue.

heading: Cannot Start Dungeon
text: You have no heroes in your party.

heading: Invalid Search Parameters
text: Your search must contain at least two characters.

heading: Cannot Collect Fusion
text: Your inventory is currently full.

heading: Cannot Start Fusion
text: You do not have enough gold.

heading: No Fusion Slots Available
text: You do not have any available fusion slots.

heading: Cannot Fulfill Order
text: You do not have this item.

heading: Cannot Purchase Recipe
text: You do not have enough gold.

heading: Cannot Purchase Perk
text: You do not have enough gold or materials.

heading: You purchased a recipe!
text: Craft your new {0} on the recipe tab!

heading: {0} has been mastered!
text: Rarity crafting chances doubled and material costs removed.

heading: Cannot Start Craft
text: You have not bought this recipe from the Guild Sales.

heading: Cannot Start Smithing
text: You do not have enough gold.

heading: Cannot Start Smithing
text: Need {1} more {0}.

heading: Forge Success!
text: Your {0} has been improved!

heading: Extraction Complete!
text: You collected {1} {0}!

heading: Cannot Smith Item
text: Item is at maximum enhancement.

heading: Cannot Perform Resynthesis
text: You do not have enough materials.

heading: Cannot Afford Reward
text: You do not have enough points to purchase this reward.

heading: Cannot Afford Upgrade
text: You do not have enough Monster Trophies to purchase this upgrade.

heading: Tinker Command Disabled
text: Not enough gold to research.

heading: Tinker Research Complete
text: Not enough gold to complete research.

heading: Cannot Swap Playbook
text: Cannot swap while hero is on an adventure.

heading: Cannot Start Quest
text: Quest team is not fully populated.
